column5: Furry Friends got the Xmas donation this morning,  a lot of these places rely solely on donations.  A couple dollars of food and other stuff goes a long way to help them live.
We dropped off $75 worth of dog & cat food at the local shelter last week
That's real nice of you Lew.
This place also depends alot on donations and as you say, i't's nice to help out.
We usually give to Whispering Hearts horse rescue in Haggersville. We adopted a big furry friend from there 2 years ago..
Gentle giants when they are treated right.
Great reminder guys, thanks. I have food to drop off.  Whispering Hearts??? how do you NOT adopt with a name like that?  lol
It's certainly a special place.. As is our big furry friend.. Lol
Stunning animal. Good on you for providing a home.
